article.description: Sam Houston St. 75, Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 67
article.headline: Sam Houston St. 75, Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 67
article.linkText: Sam Houston St. 75, Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 67
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas -- Josten Crow scored 17 points and Sam Houston State extended its winning streak to four games with a 75-67 victory against Texas A&M-Corpus Christi Saturday night. Lance Pevehouse scored 16 points, Gilberto Clavell scored 13 and reserve Nafis Richardson contributed 12 points for the Bearkats (13-10, 6-4 Southland). Sam Houston State led 26-24 at halftime, then roared out to a 16-point lead less than 8 minutes into the second half. The Bearkats shot 55 percent in the second half, including 50 percent (6 for 12) from 3-point range, and made 46 percent for the game. Terence Jones led Texas A&M-Corpus Christi with 21 points. Jawan Nelson and Demond Watt scored 10 points apiece for the Islanders (8-17, 3-7), who have lost five of their last six.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
